newsitem.title: USA: Micro Warehouse faces class action suit.
newsitem.headline: Micro Warehouse faces class action suit.

text.p: Micro Warehouse Inc shareholders filed a class action suit against the company, alleging Micro Warehouse misrepresented material facts related to its financial condition, the plaintiff's lawyers said on Wednesday.

The lawyers said the suit, named "Haddad v. Micro Warehouse Inc, et al," alleged the company and some of its directors misrepresented or omitted facts about its financial condition which artificially inflated the stock price.
The company was not immediately available to comment on the latest class action suit.
Micro Warehouse said on September 30 it would likely restate its financial results for its 1994 and 1995 fiscal years after finding errors in its accounting procedures.
Plaintiffs were represented by several law firms including Savett Frutkin Podell & Ryan P.C. The suit was filed in the U.S. District Court in Connecticut, they said.
